column7: Delicious pastries and fab coffee too!
column9: Friendly and welcoming. Excellent coffee - artfully decorated late and cappuccinos! Delicious pastries, including a good range of Gluten Free.  Centrally located in Lund with reasonably pleasant outlook. Basic, but not unappealing, decor. Clean venue. One thing, please remember to return your plates and cutlery...More
A place to come back to! Always surprised, never bored. You have to come back because you can´t possibly try everything in one day..:-)

A welcoming confectioner's, spotlessly clean and with the best pastries and cakes I have tasted in south Sweden. Also, the staff is friendly and very efficient. Not to be missed if in Lund.
Their version of the ubiquitous cinnamon roll is especially fragrant and soft:...More

With the bakery in the next room you get an extra nice smell of freshly baked bread and cakes. If you want their best, you need to pree order. It is their "vetekaka", a lot of butter and sugar!! Yummy!!

column7: What a cozy cafe to be in
column9: The pastries were all so delicious. I especially like their 'semla'. The location is so central to Lund so it's easy to get to. The big windows make for a bright interior. The staff just looked so clean and well-groomed. Somehow, that added to the...More
Helt ok fika i en traditionel konditorimiljö. Hjälpsam personal men något höga priser för den fika som erbjuds.
Stort utbud av småkakor ,kondisbitar, bakelser och tårtor,dessutom ett imponerande antal sorter glutenfria bakverk,olika kaffesorter och lugn och trivsamt café...More
Fräscha, prisvärda bakverk, serviceinriktade personal i traditionell miljö men med självhämt till bordet.
Förr när jag var i Lund och ville fika var Ramklints ett säkert kort så därför valde vi detta även...More

Jättebra sortiment, gott, trevlig service. Detta är ett toppenställe att fika. Inte det billigaste stället kanske, men riktigt bra.

Stort sortiment av klassiska bakverk och även goda smörgåsar.
Man kan till och med se bagaren ibland, så allt är...More
